summary: Enthusiastic and motivated software engineer with experience and knowledge in various technologies. Has analytical, communication, problem-solving skills, and a passion for learning new technologies. Re-entering the industry after taking some time to work in the real estate field while staying engaged with technology by working on personal projects and recently acquired the AWS Solutions Architect Associate Certification.

accomplishments: Communicate with buyers, sellers, and renters to understand property needs, timeline, and budgets.
Developed positive relationships with lenders, appraisers, home inspectors, and escrow companies.
Consulted on technology solutions to improve company efficiency, cost effectiveness, and surveillance of daily operations.
Consulted on computer hardware and software for business operations.
Created PDQ Touch Notes web app which assists doctors and therapists in getting their documentation done efficiently. Coded with: JavaScript, jQuery, jQuery Mobile, HTML, CSS, & SQL.
Designed and coded a cross-browser compatible website. Coded with: PHP, HTML, & CSS.
Engaged in software support for the company's EMR Desktop Software and barcode scanner devices.

skills.name: AWS Cloud
skills.description: IAM, EC2, S3, Databases, DNS using Route 53, VPCs, ELB, Elastic Beanstalk, EFS, Autoscaling, CloudFront, API Gateway, Lambda, CloudWatch, CloudTrail, Session Manager, SNS, and high level understanding of services such as SQS, SWF, CloudFormation, Cognito, and Kinesis.

skills.name: Tools
skills.description: Terraform, Docker, MySQL Workbench, Git, GitHub, NPM, Postman, VirtualBox.

skills.name: Web
skills.description: JavaScript, React, SQL, NodeJs, HTML, CSS, jQuery, JSON.

projects.name: Resume Website
projects.description: Designed and created a React single-page resume site running it on AWS serverless infrastructure provisioned using Terraform with a CI/CD pipeline. ReactJs, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, S3, Route53, Certificates Manager, CloudFront, API Gateway, Lambda (Python Boto3), DynamoDB, Terraform, and Github Actions for CI/CD.

projects.name: Pomodoro Timer
projects.description: Designed and created a React Pomodoro Timer single-page application and deployed it to Amazon S3. Used ReactJs, Amazon S3, CloudFront, ACM, Route53, and Github Actions.

projects.name: Isolate Virtual Network
projects.description: Designed a logically isolated virtual network and utilized Amazon VPC service to launch AWS resources. Created a public and private subnet, used the private subnet for a database to protect it from the internet and used the public subnet for web servers. Elastic Load Balancing was used to automatically distribute incoming application traffic across multiple targets.
